data.name: OpenGDC
data.description: An open-source Java tool to automatically extract and convert all clinical and genomic data from the Genomic Data Commons to BED, GTF, CSV, and JSON format

evidence: "OpenGDC is an open-source Java tool for the automatic extraction, extension, and conversion in BED, GTF, CSV, JSON, and XML format of all the genomic experiments and clinical information from the Genomic Data Commons (GDC) portal"
"This is a NetBeans project. Just clone the repo, load it into NetBeans, set the GUI.java class as the main class, and compile... Double click on the produced JAR and start playing with OpenGDC."
"Software web-page: http://geco.deib.polimi.it/opengdc/" (web page hosted under a lab/group domain at deib.polimi.it, indicating a research group responsibility)
